job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ltpgtOda processes thousands of real estate images every day to better understand and serve to different audiences with evolving interests and tastes As a machine learning engineer in our team youll help build and scale our cuttingedge Oda Optimization image processing and recommendation pipelineampnbspltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtWhat youll doltpgtltulgtltligtDevelop ampamp Train ampamp Monitor deep learning models to improve various Oda productsltligtltligtCollect ampamp Clean ampamp Generate custom datasets for DLML model trainingampnbspltligtltligtDesign and implement software solutions to improve our image processing pipeline to personalize services to different clientsampnbspltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtWhat were looking forltpgtltulgtltligt2 years of industry experienceltligtltligtBS or MS in Computer Science Statistics or related fieldltligtltligtExperience working with CNN Autoencoder and Transformer architecturesampnbspltligtltligtExpertise in Pytorch  Tensorflow or other GPU APIsltligtltligtHandson experience with data processing pipelines databases and large scale machine learning systemsltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtNice to haveltpgtltulgtltligtBackground in recommendation or computational advertisingltligtltligtWorking knowledge of Reinforcement Learning Algorithmsltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgt
